orinoco
Interface LayoutWriter

All Superinterfaces:
TextWriter
All Known Implementing Classes:
orinoco.layout.BaseWriter, Document
public interface LayoutWriter
extends TextWriter

An interface containing the various methods enabling client applications to invoke operations which layout text

Method Summary

          Adds a tab to the document

          Clears all the tabs

          Draws a horizontal line across from the specified horizontal position for the specified length

          Draws a horizontal line across from the specified horizontal position for the specified length

          Draws a horizontal line across the entire available width.

addTab

public void addTab(double t)
Adds a tab to the document

Parameters:
t - the tab position in cms

clearTabs

Clears all the tabs

createTable

public Table createTable(Column[] cols)
Creates a new table with the specified column definitions. Any tables that are currently being written are closed first

Parameters:
cols - the column definitions
Returns:
the table

createTable

public Table createTable(Column[] cols,
                         Heading[] hdrs)
Creates a new table with the specified column definitions. Any tables that are currently being written are closed first

Parameters:
hdrs - the column headings
cols - the column definitions
Returns:
the table

drawLine

public void drawLine()
              throws java.io.IOException
Draws a horizontal line across the entire available width. For documents this will be across the whole page, for table cells, across the width of the cell etc

Throws:
java.io.IOException

drawLine

                     double length)
              throws java.io.IOException
Draws a horizontal line across from the specified horizontal position for the specified length

Parameters:
from - the x position in cms
length - the length of the line in cms
Throws:
java.io.IOException

drawLine

public void drawLine(double from,
                     double length,
                     int ps)
              throws java.io.IOException
Draws a horizontal line across from the specified horizontal position for the specified length

Parameters:
ps - the point size of the line
from - the x position of the line
length - the length of the line
Throws:
java.io.IOException

drawLine

public void drawLine(int ps)
              throws java.io.IOException
Draws a horizontal line across the entire available width. For documents this will be across the whole page, for table cells, across the width of the cell etc

Parameters:
ps - the point size in which to render the line
Throws:
java.io.IOException

newLine

public void newLine()
             throws java.io.IOException
Writes a carriage return to the document

Throws:
java.io.IOException

releaseIndent

public void releaseIndent()
                   throws java.io.IOException
Releases the indent level back to zero

Throws:
java.io.IOException

setIndent

public void setIndent()
               throws java.io.IOException
Sets the indent level to the current tab position. Every call of newLine will move to this point until the releaseIndent method is called

Throws:
java.io.IOException

space

public void space(double amount)
           throws java.io.IOException
Adds vertical white space after the current line. The amount of vertical space is specified in cms

Parameters:
amount - the amount of white space to add in cms
Throws:
java.io.IOException

         throws java.io.IOException
Moves to the next tab which is greater than the current x position
